name: Srimanthula Shiva Chary
college: Hyderabad Institute Of Technology and Management

full_output.summary: Seeking a challenging position in an organization where I can utilize my skills in Java programming, Microservices architecture, and Spring Boot to contribute effectively to project development and enhance my professional growth.

education.school: Hyderabad Institute Of Technology and Management

projects.name: Project Management System
projects.description: Developed a web application for handling projects. Deployed and maintained project management tools using J2EE technologies such as JSP and Servlets. Integrated database functionalities and managed data retrieval and storage. Implemented multi-threading to enhance application performance. Handled exceptions efficiently to ensure robust application performance.

projects.name: Smart Check-in and Check-out using RFID
projects.description: Developed a web application for hotel customers check-in and check-out. Integrated RFID technology for automated guest management. Configured and deployed web server applications using XAMPP. Designed user interface for seamless customer interaction.

projects.name: Temperature Controlled Fan using Arduino
projects.description: Implemented an automatic fan control system using Arduino, IR sensor, and DHT11. Programmed microcontroller for real-time temperature monitoring and fan speed adjustment. Used statistical analysis for temperature data to ensure accurate control.

experiences.description: Developed a RESTful web service proposal for managing employee lists. Implemented a Java Spring Boot web server application supporting HTTP requests. Executed unit tests to evaluate application performance and functionality. Applied logging and asynchronous APIs for improved performance and monitoring.

Analyzed requirements for a financial portfolio management system. Designed entity relationship diagrams (ERD) and implemented them using IntelliJ. Published project documentation and code repository management on GitHub.

skills: Core Java: OOP, Collections, Multithreading, Exception Handling
Frameworks: Spring Boot, Spring MVC, JPA
Web Technologies: HTML, CSS, RESTful API, JSON
soft_skills: Problem-solving: Strong analytical skills, adept at troubleshooting and resolving technical issues.
Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, effective in team environments.
Adaptability: Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
full_output.name: Srimanthula Shiva Chary
